SURV_DBMS: Database management systems:- currently supporting 2 (Postgres / postgresdb & mongo / mongodb)

SURV_FORMS.name: name of the form (table name uses this so it should not have spaces)
SURV_FORMS.unique_column: PRIMARY KEY COLUMN (used for references so, the column must be unique)
SURV_FORMS.form_id: form ID as on SurveyCTO survers
SURV_FORMS.last_date: Last submission date for data being fetched. Accepts url-encoded dates of Epoc(Oct%2013%2C%202015%2000%3A00%3A00%20AM)

fields.name: field_1
fields.type: data_type (VAR:-for less than 100 chars, Text:- for long texts)
